topics.body:
Just got a commission to write a fanfic that would ship Trixie and someone's OC. I asked for a description of the OC and no joke, _word for word,_ this was the response I got:

"Oh she's 13 years 
An alicorn princess (is in training under guidance of princess cadence who lives in the cyrstal empire)
Bi sexual 
Outgoing can be annoying loud obnoxious sexual lwed perverted kind (sometimes only to ppl who are not *****es) can be a total snob brat and ***** Whiny crys a lot throughs a lot of fits, when she does not get her way complaines feels inperfect and lonley even hated . Gets everything she wants. Me in a nutshell lol

So yah"

Going against my moral judgement, I'll take the job anyway. Because people with OCs like this will be impressed with just about anything I write, so I won't really have to worry about obtaining the utmost quality.
